title: Incorrect Purchase of Bundle for new Thresh Skin
body:
To Whom It May Concern,

I was trying to gift the new bundle skin for thresh and when I clicked on the link it automatically purchased it for myself. I was unaware of the changes that were made where it doesn't give you an option of how to make to the purchase or who the purchase is for. 

I was hoping that this could be refunded as I did not want the skin bundle I was purchasing it for a friend.

I have now just purchased him the RP for him to buy it as there is no option to buy bundles as a gift for friends.

The receipt number for the purchase is: 

OC1-e97d5104-f7dc-11e5-b7d9-1dad0d3b0155

Please contact me as soon as possible

replies.body: Heyo! Unfortunately bundles can neither be gifted nor refunded, as per the refund policy that SephirothSG linked in his comment. However, if anything, you could try to contact Riot Games Player Support, as perhaps they might be able to give you better news, albeit unlikely. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

Hey there,

Having just attempted to purchase a skin for myself I can in fact confirm that you are still prompted before making a purchase (As can be seen in the screenshot below)
http://puu.sh/pwBlH/86a2690b95.jpg

For more information about the Content Refund system, [check out the FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).
